model.database

Class UsersTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.database.DatabaseTable
      • model.database.UsersTable

  • public class UsersTable
extends DatabaseTable
    Contains methods that run SQL queries relevant to the Users Table. Registration and login is also done here.
    Since:
    30/10/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Paul King - s3449513

      Find a user in the database matching a specific id

      Handles the login by comparing credentials with the database
      void Logout()
      Logs out the user by setting the the static current user variable in DatabaseTable to null
      boolean register(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String name)
      Runs the registration process by first hashing the password then adding a new user to the database

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String email,
                     java.lang.String password)
        Handles the login by comparing credentials with the database
        Parameters:
        email - used as the username
        password - the user's password
        Returns:
        returns true of login was successful, fals if it failed

      • register

        public boolean register(java.lang.String email,
                        java.lang.String password,
                        java.lang.String name)
        Runs the registration process by first hashing the password then adding a new user to the database
        Parameters:
        email - This is the username
        password - this is the un-hashed password
        name - This is a combination of the first name and last name
        Returns:
        returns true if login was successful, false if it failed

      • showUsersTable

        public void showUsersTable()
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        prints the entire Users table to the console
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getUser

        public User getUser(int id)
             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Find a user in the database matching a specific id
        Parameters:
        id - the id to search the Users table for
        Returns:
        returns the user object created from result set
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:
